mdRecord.dcterms:title: Mt. Vernon Mansion, West, or Original Front.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Johnson, N. G. (Newton G.)
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Stereoscopic view of the west front of the Mount Vernon Mansion. A lone figure appears to be standing in the open doorway. Photograph taken from the bowling green. Mounted on orange board. The photographer's imprint on the front of the card reads, N. G. Johnson, Photographer, 309 9th Street, Washington D. C. Only Authorized Publisher of Mount Vernon Views. A preprinted label affixed to the reverse reads, Mt. Vernon Mansion, West, or Original Front. Originally built in 1743 by Lawrence Washington, and extended in 1784-5 by General Washington. It is 96 feet long by 30 feet wide. Copyright by the Mount Vernon Association.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
George Washington's Mount Vernon
